name: Battery Life (Attala)
description:
Battery Life is a top-down action/puzzler game. You are a battery and you have to use your energi, (your lifesource), to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.

Use W, A, S, D or the arrow keys to control the player battery. Shoot with the mousecursor and left mousebutton.

This is my first ever LD, and my first game submitted/released anywhere.
